Trade/Device Name(s): UniStrip1 Generic Blood Glucose Test Strips
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): OneTouch Ultra meters (with specific purchase dates and calibration code 49)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for UniStrip1 Generic Blood Glucose Test Strips used with select OneTouch Ultra meters to monitor glucose in capillary whole blood for diabetes management.
Indications for Use Summary: For self-testing of blood glucose using select OneTouch Ultra meters as an aid to monitor diabetes control; quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood from finger, palm, or forearm; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
